text: An la she ge biyu: Yige ren [nuli] shuyu yi huo huxiang zhengchao zhe [ru ji bai an la you bai ouxiang zhe] suoyou, er ling yige ren [nuli] ze wanquan shuyu yige zhuren [ru zhi bai du yi de an la zhe] suoyou. Zhe liang ren de qingkuang xiangtong ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
